text: Hardijs Baumanis (10 December 1967 - 6 April 2015) was a Latvian diplomat. He served as Ambassador of Latvia to Lithuania and Azerbaijan from 2010 until his death. Baumanis was born in Riga. He died on 6 April 2015 in Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan, aged 47. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Ambassadors Category:People from Riga Category:Latvian politicians Category:European diplomats
title: Hardijs Baumanis
